content: As Raj will discuss among the clinical milestones that we've reached during the quarter, and since our R&D Day in September, we announced this morning that we are seeing encouraging initial safety results from our Phase 2 ADC trial with sacituzumab govitecan that shows its potential to provide clinically meaningful reductions of over 50% in adverse events related to sacituzumab such as myelosuppression, diarrhea, and potentially even alopecia compared to previously published single agent safety profile of this ADC.
